channel.title: >AdzeScape|BETA|Great Pk'ing!|Great Bossing|New|Staff OPEN!<
channel.description:
[CENTER] [IMG]http://adzescape.xyz/community/images/df/logo.png[/img] [COLOR=red]AdzeScape is currently in Beta Mode![/COLOR] [COLOR=black]_-=Links=-_[/COLOR] [URL=http://"http://adzescape.xyz/portal.php"]Home[/URL] | [URL=http://"http://adzescape.xyz"]Forums[/URL] | [URL=http://"http://adzescape.xyz/client.jar"]Play Now[/URL] [SPOILER=Information][COLOR=blue]Hey there! AdzeScape is a brand new server that is based on OS with new items and what not! The owners are Mike & Gavin and they are 2 very active and helpful owners. It has a unique home and has tons of content for you to come try out! We are based on enjoyment and not paying to be the best. Anything except for a couple of extra features is available to all players at any time! The server is undergoing updates daily & the coder(Mike) is always adding new content!
[COLOR=red]AdzeScape is currently in Beta and asks for patience from it's players in the event we update alot every day. We welcome our players warmly and can't wait for your ideas on things to add! Any content you suggest will be added if it's a good idea! Just tell Mike :) We look forward to seeing you![/COLOR] Come check it out[/COLOR]![/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Some pictures for ya ;)][IMG]http://www.google.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/Adzescape-1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Cymi18F.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/RH4yYC8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Frchi8W.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/uQS0ZZ1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/etxxkdS.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/C79xQvj.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/sXPUlYR.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/c6WBjKl.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/lfvpO9Z.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hJORei6.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/PJ8scx3.png[/img] [/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=Some of the many features include] [COLOR=red] Chaotics Great Bosses! Familiar home :) Tormented Demons! Active Owners! Tons of content! Achievements! Slayer Shop and Rewards! 24/7 VPS Hosted![/COLOR] [/SPOILER] So why not come on and check us out? Remember, we aim for enjoyment and entertainment. Not for cash!
[URL=http://"http://adzescape.xyz"][IMG]http://adzescape.xyz/community/images/df/logo.png[/img][/URL] Join today! [/CENTER]

item.description:
@Nerdypker123 wrote:

The links do not work, and the client doesn’t work as well. It doesn’t open up and it continues to run so to delete it you have to end the process and then delete it. The website won’t allow you to sign up because it “thinks you’re a bot, contact an admin”.

[CENTER]

[COLOR=red]AdzeScape is currently in Beta Mode![/COLOR]
[COLOR=black]-=Links=-[/COLOR]
Home | Forums | Play Now
[SPOILER=Information][COLOR=blue]Hey there! AdzeScape is a brand new server that is based on OS with new items and what not!
The owners are Mike & Gavin and they are 2 very active and helpful owners. It has a unique home and has tons of content for you to come try out!
We are based on enjoyment and not paying to be the best. Anything except for a couple of extra features is available to all players at any time! The server is undergoing updates daily & the coder(Mike) is always adding new content!

[COLOR=red]AdzeScape is currently in Beta and asks for patience from it’s players in the event we update alot every day.
We welcome our players warmly and can’t wait for your ideas on things to add! Any content you suggest will be added if it’s a good idea! Just tell Mike
We look forward to seeing you![/COLOR]
Come check it out[/COLOR]![/SPOILER]
